name: Food Fight (itch) (Whatavins)
description:
It's time for the Food Fight!!

Spawn units, select them and make them travel the world! Use your imagination to see fruits and vegetables instead of marbles !!

Disclamer : We didn't have time to include combat mechanism, press Debug Win when you've had enough! 

How to play :

    -Press play

    -Select LAN Host (top left corner)

    -Scroll back to see the map

    -Select buildings and click on the map to add them, they will automatically spawn units

     -Select a unit with left click or select many by dragging, then right click anywhere to make them move to that point (Since units love North Africa, they will always finish their journey there)

    - For a 2 player online experience, boot the game on another PC and enter the first PC IP address instead of 'localhost' before pressing LAN Client

By team 404NOTFOUND
